name: Marina Van Esselstyn
what_you_do: We are a 501c3 public charity committed to healing the world through the promotion of whole food, plant-based nutrition.
who_you_serve: We partner with existing non-profits and community-based organizations to spread our message far and wide.
seeking: We are looking to collaborate by partnering with other nonprofits and community-based organizations across the United States to provide the best access and programs.
business_focus: Healing the world through the promotion of whole food, plant-based nutrition.
service_provided: Providing free programming to partner organizations, conducting action research, prototyping real-world solutions
